env.name: TZ
env.label: TZ
env.description: Specify a timezone to use for example America/New_York

env.name: WEB_CONCURRENCY
env.label: WEB_CONCURRENCY
env.description: Override the automatic definition of number of workers.

env.name: MAX_WORKERS
env.label: MAX_WORKERS
env.description: Set the maximum number of workers to use. Default is not set meaning unlimited.

env.name: RECIPE_PUBLIC
env.label: RECIPE_PUBLIC
env.description: Default Recipe Settings - Make Recipe Public.

env.name: RECIPE_SHOW_NUTRITION
env.label: RECIPE_SHOW_NUTRITION
env.description: Default Recipe Settings - Show Recipe Nutrition.

env.name: RECIPE_SHOW_ASSETS
env.label: RECIPE_SHOW_ASSETS
env.description: Default Recipe Settings - Show Recipe Assets.

env.name: RECIPE_LANDSCAPE_VIEW
env.label: RECIPE_LANDSCAPE_VIEW
env.description: Default Recipe Settings - Set Landscape View.

description: A self-hosted recipe manager and meal planner
name: mealie
